item.title: Leaf-colonising Bacteria Colony Phenotype
item.description: Here are some bacteria I am working with. I will try to update some interesting info about these bacteria. Phylogenetic tree This tree does not include all of my strains. Later I will update my own figure. Simisola et al (2019) Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2 ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas sp. leaf 34.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas sp. leaf 17.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas sp. leaf 357.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2.jpg) ![](/media/bacteria/Sphingomonas phyllosphaerae FA2.
